content:
That's a great idea! Placing a few sprigs of eucalyptus near the locket and vases can add a lovely touch of freshness and color to your vignette. Remember to experiment with different placements and angles to find the spot that looks and feels the most balanced to you.

Don't be afraid to move things around and try out different arrangements until you find one that feels visually appealing to you. And don't worry if it takes a few tries to get it just right - it's all part of the creative process!

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, have fun creating your vignette and enjoying your beautiful antique locket and vintage vases!

(By the way, I'm curious - how's your coffee table looking now? Is it feeling more organized and stylish with your new vignette?)
